name: I Never Gonna Leave This Bed
name_original: I Never Gonna Leave This Bed
description:
Created for GMTK GameJam 2021 under 48hr
With Theme "JoinedTogether"

I created this in memory of my beloved dog who sometimes visits me in my sleep.

Credits
Music - Bensound
Tileset - PixelFrog
Pixel Food - Ghostpixxells
